actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

specialTraits.description: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of one or more nupperibos must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) acid damage. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage.
specialTraits.name: Cloud of Vermin

specialTraits.description: In the Nine Hells, the nupperibo can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo's Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.
specialTraits.name: Driven Tracker
